Page offline training

Classes and privates

Explore your physical abilities

During summer periods a wide variety of classes invites you to train and move with like-minded people on a daily basis. Some classes are more skill-oriented,

while others push abstract concepts like acrobatics and movement research. You won't miss your dose of playfulness in most of the classes.

Classes

  • all
  • movement
  • strength
  • mobility
  • handstand
Group class

Movement & Softacro

Intermediate, Advanced

Movement, acro-dance, research, and play. Researching movement-concepts on one hand, and focussing on specific skills on the other. Through the concept of isolation, integration and improvisation even complex skills become easy to understand.

  • Lukas Flint
  • coming soon
  • tba
Group class

Handbalance

All levels

We intense, but playfully confront our fears being upside down and find balance. Structured training and support enable you to build up a solid handstand. This is an open level class, where we seperate groups later on, in beginners and more experienced students.

  • Lukas Flint
  • coming soon
  • tba
Group class

Handbalance

Basic

We intense, but playfully confront our fears being upside down and find balance. Structured training and support enable you to build up a solid handstand. This is an open level class, where we seperate groups later on, in beginners and more experienced students.

  • Lukas Flint
  • coming soon
  • tba
Group class

Ringstrength

Basic

Within the Ringstrength-class, we will focus on Strength using the gymnastic rings. Here we learn the proper way to handle the rings, as well as Muscle ups, forward rolls, frontlevers and everything you can possibly imagine. Open to all levels.

  • Lukas Flint
  • coming soon
  • tba
Group class

Handstand-strength

Basic

In this Class we dedicate our time to build up a solid, foundational Handstand-strength, and to take care of important shoulder-relevant topics. Handstand-strength-elements are e.g.: the Press Up, the Stalder press, the Handstandpushup and its variations.

  • Lukas Flint
  • coming soon
  • tba

Booking available soon

Personal Training

Individual approach for everybody

In a private session, the time is dedicated to you and your goals only. You decide if you want to train once per week, once per month, or for several hours on one day. I help to reclaim control and feel free and strong in a well-prepared body.

From 80 send request
Your foundation is freedom for your movement.
  • lukasflinttraining@gmail.com
  • +49 1573 2310340
